de.esoco.lib.property

Interface LayoutProperties

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserInterfaceProperties

    public interface LayoutProperties
    Defines typical layout Properties.

    • Field Detail

      • ORDER

        static final PropertyName<java.lang.Integer> ORDER
        Integer: override the default ordering of elements in a layout.

      • ROW

        static final PropertyName<java.lang.Integer> ROW
        Integer: the layout row to place an element at.

      • COLUMN

        static final PropertyName<java.lang.Integer> COLUMN
        Integer: the layout column to place an element at.

      • ROWS

        static final PropertyName<java.lang.Integer> ROWS
        Integer: the number of rows an element shall display.

      • COLUMNS

        static final PropertyName<java.lang.Integer> COLUMNS
        Integer: the number of columns and element shall display.

      • ROW_SPAN

        static final PropertyName<java.lang.Integer> ROW_SPAN
        Integer: the number of rows that an element spans in a layout.

      • COLUMN_SPAN

        static final PropertyName<java.lang.Integer> COLUMN_SPAN
        Integer: the number of columns that an element spans in a layout.

      • MEDIUM_COLUMN_SPAN

        static final PropertyName<java.lang.Integer> MEDIUM_COLUMN_SPAN
        Integer: the number of columns that an element spans in a responsive layout with reduced (medium) layout space. This complements COLUMN_SPAN which defines the maximum layout size.

      • SMALL_COLUMN_SPAN

        static final PropertyName<java.lang.Integer> SMALL_COLUMN_SPAN
        Integer: the number of columns that an element spans in a responsive layout with minimal (= small) layout space. This complements COLUMN_SPAN which defines the maximum layout size.

      • WIDTH

        static final PropertyName<java.lang.Integer> WIDTH
        Integer: the display width in pixels.

      • HEIGHT

        static final PropertyName<java.lang.Integer> HEIGHT
        Integer: the display height in pixels.

      • HTML_WIDTH

        static final PropertyName<java.lang.String> HTML_WIDTH
        String: the display width in HTML units.

      • HTML_HEIGHT

        static final PropertyName<java.lang.String> HTML_HEIGHT
        String: the display height in HTML units.

      • LAYOUT

        static final PropertyName<LayoutType> LAYOUT
        LayoutType: The layout of an element.

      • LAYOUT_AREA

        static final PropertyName<java.lang.String> LAYOUT_AREA
        String: The name of the layout are an element should be placed in (e.g. in a CSS grid layout).

      • LAYOUT_VISIBILITY

        static final PropertyName<LayoutVisibility> LAYOUT_VISIBILITY
        LayoutVisibility: The visibility of an element in the responsive rendering of layouts.

      • VIEW_DISPLAY_TYPE

        static final PropertyName<ViewDisplayType> VIEW_DISPLAY_TYPE
        ViewDisplayType: The display style of a view.

      • RELATIVE_WIDTH

        static final PropertyName<RelativeSize> RELATIVE_WIDTH
        Enum: a relative width constant.

      • RELATIVE_HEIGHT

        static final PropertyName<RelativeSize> RELATIVE_HEIGHT
        Enum: a relative height constant.

      • SAME_ROW

        static final PropertyName<java.lang.Boolean> SAME_ROW
        Boolean: a layout hint that indicates that an element should be displayed in the same row as the previous data element(s).

      • FLOAT

        static final PropertyName<Alignment> FLOAT
        Alignment: defines that an element should float above other content with the given alignment. Which alignments are supported depends on the implementation.

      • HORIZONTAL_ALIGN

        static final PropertyName<Alignment> HORIZONTAL_ALIGN
        Alignment: the horizontal alignment of an element.

      • VERTICAL_ALIGN

        static final PropertyName<Alignment> VERTICAL_ALIGN
        Alignment: the horizontal alignment of an element.

      • TEXT_ALIGN

        static final PropertyName<Alignment> TEXT_ALIGN
        Alignment: the alignment of text within an element.

      • ICON_ALIGN

        static final PropertyName<Alignment> ICON_ALIGN
        Alignment: the alignment of an icon within an element.

      • ICON_SIZE

        static final PropertyName<RelativeScale> ICON_SIZE
        Enum: The relative scale of an ContentProperties.ICON.

      • BUTTON_SIZE

        static final PropertyName<RelativeScale> BUTTON_SIZE
        Enum: The relative scale of an ContentProperties.ICON.

      • DIRECTION

        static final PropertyName<Orientation> DIRECTION
        Enum: The layout direction of an element.
